LanguageData.DMS_AddonBroken: The modification durability on one of your mech has exhausted
LanguageData.DMS_PlatingTooltip: Disposable ceramic armor protects the mecha from damage as ablative armor until its durability is exhausted and needs replacement.
LanguageData.DMS_AutomatroidDisconnected: Automatroid has disconnected to protect the echanitor
LanguageData.DMS_BandwidthSupported: Orbital downlink has established connection with mechanitor
LanguageData.DMS_MountedWeaponCanOnlyBeEquippedBySpec: This weapon can only be equipped with listed automatroid or mechframe
LanguageData.DMS_WeaponCanBeEquippedBySpecificApparel: This weapon can be equipped with listed specific apparel or bionics
LanguageData.DMS_Modification_NoValidPart: no valid part for apply modification
LanguageData.DMS_MechReturnDesc: a wandering mech that was under your command has returned to your base.
LanguageData.DMS_MechWakeDesc:
maybe because it has been wandering for a long time, the dead man switch doesn't reset as usual, and the faulty unit has gained its understanding of death. 

It named itself and now refuses to be controlled, but it respected its former commander. 

it will follow your command until it decides to leave.
LanguageData.DMS_MechStartLeaveDesc: After spending some time together, {0} decided it is time to leave.
LanguageData.DMS_WokenMechLeaveDesc: After spending some time together, {0} decided it is time to leave.
LanguageData.DMS_InprintedDesc: the colony mech {0} has equipped with its first weapon, this makes its adaptive learning ability bound to that type of weapon.
LanguageData.DMS_Req_TechLevel: Must be in listed tech level:
LanguageData.DMS_Req_BodySize: Can equip heavy weapon with bodysize requirement below:{0}
LanguageData.DMS_Req_WeaponFilter: Limited to use listed weapon below
